title: Birthday Questions, Pastor Gray Talk, LA Teachers Strike, Travis Scott, R. Kelly Conversation, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Birthday Questions, Pastor Gray Talk, LA Teachers Strike, Travis Scott, R. Kelly Conversation, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
We edify and glorify one another today.  Big Dog is asked birthday reflection questions.  Pastor John Gray is at the center of controversy.  L.A. teachers are officially on strike to get better wages and working conditions.  Travis Scott is getting some heat for his deal to perform at Super Bowl.  Celine Dion is now part of the latest regarding R. Kelly's situations.  In Closing Remarks today, Big Dog gives us the best recipe for our best year in 2019.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
